data.text: @BrasovAndy Hi Brasov! Please be informed that Wizz Flex cancellation covers your purchased services, seat and priority boarding services included. Only third-party services like insurance and car rent are excluded. We hope this information helps. Have a great rest of the day!

entity.name: Martin
entity.description: Stand-up comedian Martin Lawrence drives this irreverent sitcom as a sexist, cocky and wisecracking radio station talk show host. His girlfriend and eventual wife, Gina, puts up with him -- although clashes do occur. Martin's friends, Tommy and Cole, help him get into trouble.

data.text: @martin_rusinov Hi Martin! We apologize for the inconvenience. The mobile app must be working right now. We suggest you use the mobile app for your requests. Our colleagues are working on the technical problem we have with the website right now. Thank you for your understanding.

@jdparkerlane Hi There! Please use our mobile app, it must be working properly. We are having a temporary problem with the website. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

data.text: @leaveoutherest Hi. Our latest information is that the flight is delayed to 10:10. You can track your flight's live status via this link: https://t.co/0Si8WWvQIq We're sorry about the caused inconviniences.
@gpdu4 Hi. Online check-in closes 3 hours before the departure. You have to check-in at the airport now.
@C4RQUI Hi. The payment method can't be changed. You need to book a new reservation to be able to pay by card. The current reservation will be automatically deleted if not payed after a few days.
